org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.trigger.strategy

Class MemoryTriggerStrategy<T extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.trigger.strategy.MemoryTriggerStrategy<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, TriggerStrategy

    public abstract class MemoryTriggerStrategy<T extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements TriggerStrategy
    This is a helper class for the TriggerStrategies class and other implementations. It prevents duplicate code. It memorizes the last values of the decision base.
    Author:
    Erwin Wagasow Created by Erwin Wagasow on 13.08.2018
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • isToBeTriggered

        public boolean isToBeTriggered(MRecord values)
        This method decides whether it is to be triggered or not. This method is implemented in here an leads out the part of decision making into the method isToBeTriggered(Boolean decisionBase).
        Specified by:
        isToBeTriggered in interface TriggerStrategy
        Parameters:
        values - for the Supplier to extract the relevant data
        Returns:
        true if triggered, otherwise false

      • isToBeTriggered

        public abstract boolean isToBeTriggered(T decisionBase)
        This method is to be implemented by the user of this class, with the final decision making.
        Parameters:
        decisionBase - the extracted value
        Returns:
        true if triggered, otherwise false

      • getChannelIdentifiers

        public Set<String> getChannelIdentifiers()
        Returns all channel identifiers which are necessary for the function to do its job. It is not allowed to return null, an empty set can be returned (but why should??).
        Specified by:
        getChannelIdentifiers in interface TriggerStrategy
        Returns:
        a Set all channel identifiers that are needed by the Evaluation Function.
